name: Fluffy Knight
desc: This is a gray cutie with an adorable baseball hat.

reviews.text: This is the best cat ever. Yay!

name: Good Rainbow
desc: All the colors of the rainbow in cat form.

reviews.text: He's a good lookin' rainbow. I'm definitely giving him 5 stars!

name: Bumbly Meow
desc: This is a gray kitty, slighly chubby, and has a big tail.

reviews.text: This cat is very hungry and carries around a fishbone with it all the time.

name: Coy Pinky
desc: This is a pink cat and pretends he doesn't like you but he does.

name: Crazy Pinky
desc: This is a pink cat and is very crazy. Don't leave him alone with your children.

reviews.text: I left him alone with my children.

name: Curmudgeonly Crumbcatcher
desc: This a cranky, pretentious kitty.  Only loves his mouse. Doesn't share.

reviews.text: I never have any crumbs thanks to this kitty!

name: Daddy Bob
desc: This snow white kitty has sired many kittens. Named Bob.

reviews.text: good kitty, but too many kittens!
Cat out all night! Angry female cats show up in the morning! DO. NOT. Trust.

name: Delightful Ploop
desc: The most delightful kitten, big tail.

reviews.text: Good kitty! Brings you pizza! Would pet again.

name: Night Cookie
desc: Very nocturnal. Secretly eats all the fish
